content:
Hi. Is this error due to the updates?
[java] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Error: unknown version 3.4.0
[java] at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.getMasterSource(Publisher.java:1350)
[java] at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.loadCorePackage(Publisher.java:1311)
what is the correct version to use now?
Should be 3.6.0 I think if you want "current". (3.5.0 would be the one released for ballot)

And I'm not sure the 3.6 version has been incremented just yet while all the other publishing has been going on.
I'm sure grahame will get to that soonish.

I'm kind of caught - I don't want to to maintain a permanent fork for 3.5.0, but I don't reall hav any way to support 3.5.0 unless it's either a fork or current. And I agreed to support 3.5.0 for a couple of more weeks
